title: Vaporella Silence Eco Friendly_19.55 (english)
description:
Dry, powerful and constant steam. Now even quieter.
The new Vaporella Silence Friendly range is quiter and more powerful. Vaporella Silence Eco Friendly 19.55 is inherently "eco" saving up to 35% energy* and up to 40% water on all fabrics, without activating any function. (*Consumption in % compared to the models of the previous range)
